description: A trio of cheeses takes this classic Italian pasta to the next level. This creamy carbonara recipe with ricotta, parmesan and cheddar will be your new go-to.
name: Three-Cheese Spaghetti Carbonara Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g rindless middle bacon rashers, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a saucepan of boiling, salted water for 8 minutes or until al dente. Drain.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a large deep frying pan over medium-low heat. Cook bacon, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes or until golden and crisp. Remove from heat.
Whisk two-thirds of the parmesan cheese, egg yolks and cream in a jug until combined.

Add pasta, egg mixture, tasty cheese and ricotta to bacon. Cook, tossing constantly, over medium-low heat until sauce thickens and cheese melts. Season. Serve sprinkled with parsley and remaining parmesan.
